name: Selecting options from dropdowns
description:
As a beginner learning web automation
    I want to understand how to click on things and interact with a webpage
    So that I can simulate user actions
descriptionHtml:
As a beginner learning web automation

So that I can simulate user actions
statusMessage:
locator.selectOption: Error: strict mode violation: locator('[name="size"]') resolved to 3 elements:
    1) <input name="size" type="radio" value="small"/> aka getByRole('radio', { name: 'Small' })
    2) <input name="size" type="radio" value="medium"/> aka getByRole('radio', { name: 'Medium' })
    3) <input name="size" type="radio" value="large"/> aka getByRole('radio', { name: 'Large' })
